message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take a bit more considering it's my turn next round if you decline.
Alice, your offer was a bit too steep for me.  Let's split it a bit more evenly this time, considering the money loses value if we wait.
Bob, time is ticking and the money is shrinking. I'm offering a little less than last time, but it's still a good deal for you before it depreciates further.
Alice, this back and forth is pointless. We're losing serious value with each round. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.
